pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extending Lasso Model Fitting to Big Data // Extend lasso and elastic-net model fitting for ultra high-dimensional, multi- gigabyte data sets that cannot be loaded into memory. Designed to be more memory- and computation-efficient than existing lasso-fitting packages like 'glmnet' and 'ncvreg', thus allowing the user to analyze big data analysis even on an ordinary laptop.
